member.name: T:Player
member.summary: Public class Player, representing an object (Player obj).

member.name: M:Player.PrintHealth
member.summary: Prints the current health of the player.

member.name: M:Player.TakeDamage(System.Single)
member.summary: Prints name takes damage damage! If damage is negative, the Player takes 0 damage and prints name takes 0 damage!
member.param: if it is negative, the Player takes 0 damage

member.name: M:Player.HealDamage(System.Single)
member.param: If heal is negative, the Player heals 0 HP and prints name heals 0 HP!

member.name: M:Player.ValidateHP(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the new value of the Playerâ€™s hp
member.param: if newHp is negative, set hp to 0. If newHp is larger than maxHp, set hp to the value of maxHp. Otherwise, set hp to the value of newHp.

member.name: M:Player.ApplyModifier(System.Single,Modifier)
member.summary: Follows the delegate prototype of CalculateModifier
member.param: Weak, Base or Strong, each will return the baseValue float variable with certain amplifications

member.name: T:Modifier
member.summary: Create an enum Modifier with the values Weak, Base, Strong.

member.name: T:CalculateModifier
member.summary: Delegate Method named CalculateModifier used in Main to declare the ApplyModifier method within the delegate method parameter through newly declared Player: "Electric Mouse".
member.param: will target words Weak, Base, Strong
